sentences.en: All of the capital investment is made by the licensee.
sentences.cn: 所有的资本都是由买方承担.

sentences.en: As the licensee, it is your responsibility ensure that these violations have been rectified.
sentences.cn: 作为持牌人, 您有责任确保这些行为已经得到纠正.

sentences.en: Licensee may not assign or otherwise transfer the License to use the Software.
sentences.cn: 获许可的人可能不分配或者转移执照使用软件.

sentences.en: Licensee shall be entitled to make Improvement on Know - how.
sentences.cn: 被许可方有权对本专有技术予以改进.

sentences.en: Licensee: A person, company, etc. to a license is granted.
sentences.cn: 领有许可证者: 指领有许可证的个人, 公司等.

sentences.en: Note: A licensee may receive more than one type of disciplinary sanction in a case.
sentences.cn: 备注: 同一持牌人可能在一宗个案中受到超过一项纪律处分.

sentences.en: NOTE: The vehicle must be a private car registered under the licensee's name.
sentences.cn: 备注: 上述车辆必须是牌照持有人名字登记的私家车辆.

sentences.en: Rotary cutting knife is a licensee of a greater, easily damaged.
sentences.cn: 圆压圆模切刀的持不面是投资不小 、 难败恶.
那得谢谢这些特许的人了.

sentences.en: The Appeal Tribunal has reversed the Disciplinary Committee's decision on the licensee.
sentences.cn: 上诉审裁小组已推翻纪律委员会对该持牌人所作的裁决.

sentences.en: The inherent intangibility of service determines that the licensee of service marks cannot directly indicate his name and address on the service he offers.
sentences.cn: 尽管服务所具有的无形特性，使得服务商标被许可使用人无法直接在其提供的服务上标明其名称及地址。

sentences.en: The system shall be operated only by licensee and persons authorized by him in that behalf.
sentences.cn: 该系统须只由持牌人及获持牌人为此授权的人操作.

sentences.en: The system shall be operated only by persons authorized by the licensee in that behalf.
sentences.cn: 该系统须只由获持牌人为此授权的人操作.

sentences.en: The transferee must be an existing licensee of the same fish culture zone as the applicant.
sentences.cn: 受让人必须是申请人所属鱼类养殖区的现有持牌人.

sentences.en: To fulfill the licensee's obligations, appropriate actions shall be taken.
sentences.cn: 持牌人必须采取适当的行动以履行有关责任.

sentences.en: Where there is only one owner of the building, he will be the class licensee.
sentences.cn: 如果建筑物只有一名业主, 则该业主为被许可人.

words.tran_cn: 得到许可的；领有执照的
许可（licence的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 售酒执照持有者（英式英语），特许制作（或使用）…的人（或公司）
trans.tran_en: someone who has official permission to do something
